A picture frame can be used as a plant holder, by using the frame as a base and filling it with soil and plants.
A picture frame can be used as a desk organizer, by using the frame as a holder for pens, pencils, and other small items.
A picture frame can be used as a key holder, by attaching hooks or loops to the back of the frame and hanging keys from them.
A picture frame can be used as a jewelry holder, by using the frame as a display stand for necklaces, bracelets, and other jewelry.
A picture frame can be used as a magnifying glass, by using the frame as a holder for a magnifying glass and placing it over a book or document.
